lines.text: I love you, Molly. I've always loved you.
Ditto.
[last lines]
It's amazing, Molly. The love inside, you take it with you. See ya.
See ya. Bye.
I love you. I really love you.
Ditto.
Molly, you're in danger.
You can't just blurt it out like that! And quit moving around, because you're starting to make me dizzy. I'll just tell her in my own way.
[pause; then]
Molly, you in danger, girl.
He's stuck, that's what it is. He's in between worlds. You know it happens sometimes that the spirit gets yanked out so fast that the essence still feels it has work to do here.
Would you stop rambling?
I don't think I'm rambling, I'm just answering the question. He's got a attitude now.
I don't have an attitude.
Yes, you do have an attitude. If you didn't have an attitude, you would not have raised your voice at me now, would you?
God dammit...
Don't you "God dammit" me. Don't you take the Lord's name in vain with me. I don't take that!
Would you relax?
No, you relax, you're the dead guy!
I know you don't think I'm giving this 4 million dollars to a bunch of nuns!
Think of it this way, you'll go to Heaven.
I don't want to go to Heaven, I want to go to the bank and cash a GODDAMN CHECK!
Four-million dollars?
Yes. Four-million dollars. And, um, how would you like that, Mrs. Miller?
Tens and twenties?
No, a cashier's check!
Actually... I think better a cashier's check.
Right...
I'm feeling something... did he know someone by the name of Ana?
[shakes head no]
Consuelo?
[shakes head no]
Lucita?
[shakes head no]
Julieta?
[shakes head no]
Josefina?
[shakes head no]
Linda?
[getting frustrated]
Maria?
Sí, sí! His mamá! She is Maria!
Yes! Praise God, I knew he was with his mama!

[singing]
I'm Henry the 8th I am. Henry the 8th I am I am. I got married to the widow next door. She's been married seven times before.
Why don't you go haunt a house? Rattle some chains or something.
I don't know you! I don't know Sam, but let me tell you what he did to me. He kept me up all night singing "I'm Henry the Eighth I Am."
That's how he got me to go out with him.
How long have you been here?
Since they pushed me.
Someone pushed you?
Yeah, someone pushed me.
Who?
What, you don't believe me? You think I fell? You think I jumped? Well, fuck you! It wasn't my time! I wasn't supposed to go! I'm not supposed to be here!
[the ghost kicks a cigarette machine, causing cigarette packs to fall out. He looks longingly at the cigarettes]
Oh, I'd give anything for a drag! Just one drag!

[scaring/torturing Carl]
Now do you believe in ghosts?
[to the bank employee after messing up the signature card]
I'm sorry, but, could I get another one? I... uh... signed the wrong name.
He's cute. White, but cute.

[Answers the phone nervously]
Carl Bruner speaking.
Hi, Carl.
Mr. Balistrari.
Balistrari? Carl, it's me, John.
John. John, sorry, um, what - what - what - what's up?
I love you Molly. I always have.
Ditto.
They're going to kill you, Carl. You and Willie! You're going to be fertilizer. They're gonna bury you right next to Jimmy Hoffa.
Carl, are you all right?
It's just my stomach! Do you have anything like Pepto Bismol or something like that?
Cyanide!
[Oda Mae just gave a four-million-dollar check to some nuns]
I'm proud of you, Oda Mae.

You know something, Sam? I don't care if you're proud of me. You just stay away from me from now on. What is that nun going to do with it? She can't even buy underwear. NOTHING! I HATE YOU! Leave me alone! Never talk to me again!
I think you're wonderful, Oda Mae!
[she stops and gives a raspberry to Sam]
[When handing the check to the nuns]
Hand her the check.
I will!

[to Sam]
You're white. I knew it. Why me?

[calling for Molly]
Do you hear me talking to you?
I hear you!
Aw, shut up, nobody's talking to you.
Didn't you ever hear of a phone?
You wanna kiss my butt?
[pause, to Molly again]
Hey, Molly - I'm not gonna stand out here forever!
Thank God!
Aw, man, shut up!

[Sam regains his ability to move things and goes for Carl; he holds a gun on Molly]
I'll kill her, Sam! I SWEAR TO GOD, I'LL KILL HER.
[Sam is crouching on the subway station floor, trying to move a bottle cap with his fingers. The Subway Ghost is laughing at him]

What are you doing? What the hell are you doing? You're trying to move it with your finger. You can't push it with your finger! You're dead! It's all in your mind. The problem with you is that you still think you're real. You think you're wearing those clothes? You think you're crouched on that floor? Bullshit! You ain't got a body no more, son!
[Taps his forehead]
It's all up here now! You want to move something, you got to move it with your mind! You got to focus, you hear what I'm sayin'?
How? How do you focus?
I don't know *how* you focus! You just focus!
[Subway Ghost uses his finger to flick away the bottle cap]
How did you do that?
You take all your emotions! All your anger, all your love, all your hate! And push it way down here into the pit of your stomach! And then let it explode, like a reactor! Pow!
[Subway Ghost kicks a soda can across the floor]
Write it down.

[to Molly Jensen]
He wants you to write it down.
No, YOU write it down!
I ain't no DAMN secretary!

[spiritually possessed by Orlando]
Ortisha? Where you at? I can't hardly see!
Orlando? Orlando!
Damn, baby, what'd you do to yo hair?
Orlando, you like it? It's "Autumn Sunrise".

[as the Lights come for a dying man]
Lucky bastard. It could've been the other ones. You never know.
[at a bank meeting, Oda Mae has improvised several lines]
Don't embellish.
Jawohl.

[at the bank meeting]
Tell her to send this to the third-floor file because you have a transaction to make.
Can you send this to the third-floor file? I have a transfusion to make.

[after he spots Molly at the bank]
Oda Mae, we've gotta go!
Well, I'd best go now! It's been a PLEASURE doing business with you! A real pleasure! Now may I keep this...

[Sam pushes her chair to get her moving]
Say hi to Bob and Snookie for me, I'll see ya!
[She races off, talking frantically to Sam]
Now are you going to go away, Sam? 'Cause you know what, I got work to do.
No.
Fine, then, stay there.
[Turning to her customers who are not paying attention]
Eh, excuse me, EXCUSE me! You ready yet?
Julio's coming towards us. I see him! He's coming! He's there! He's dressed in a black suit.

[long pause]
Black suit?

[pause]
Could be blue!

My mother had it. My mother's mother had it. They both had the gift. They always said I had it, but I never did. I never had it. They told me what it was like. They told me all about it, but now that I got it, I don't think I want it. So do me a favor, just go away. Find somebody else.
Somebody else? You're out of your mind.
I'm gettin' there fast.

[to Sam]
Where exactly are you?
I'm standing right beside you.
Oh, you're standing right beside me?

[from in the kitchen with Oda Mae's other sister]
Honey, we're right here.
Are you *white*?
WHAT?
White?
You're white, aren't you?
You know what I think?
Yes, I'm gonna call the doctor right now.
I knew it. It's a white guy. Why me?

Listen, damn it. You are going to help me. There's a woman. Her name is Molly Jensen and she's in terrible danger. The man who killed me broke into our apartment and he's gonna go back. So you've gotta warn her.
Just what makes you think she's gonna listen to me?
It's just a phone call. Look, you're all I've got. Now, I'm not leaving until you help me. I don't care how long it takes, 'cause I could talk forever.
You bastard! YOU GODDAMN BASTARD! WHY? I had a life, goddamn you! I had a life!
Oda Mae, push a penny under the door.
What?
Push a penny under the door!
Whatch' you mean, push a penny under the door!
Just do it, okay?
You're lying to me! Don't *lie to me*!
[losing it]
Goddamn it!

[seeing Sam's body]
Shot, huh? That'll do it every time.
Can we get started soon?
Oh, chill out. Chill. Out!
